chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: [Scene: School Path]

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Arisa! Good morning~!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: Eugh! Get off, Kasumi! You're too close!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Hehehe. Sorry~! Arisa, I can't wait for today's practice! We're gonna try that song from yesterday, right?

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: What? Practice? It's still morning. We have a whole school day to get through first.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: I'm just so excited! All I wanna do is play guitar!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: Okay, fine! I get it! Just get off me already!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: [Scene: Hanasakigawa Girls' Academy - Class 1-B]

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: ~♪

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: Stop.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: What?

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: Where exactly are you going? This is my classroom. Yours is that way.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Ah...

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: Not "ah", just hurry up and get to class.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Hehehe... Okay then. I'll see you later, Arisa! For band practice of course!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: I keep telling you, practice isn't for- She can't hear me. ... Tsk. All she ever thinks about is that guitar. ... Hold on though. Tonight... doesn't she...?

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: [Scene: Hanasakigawa Girls' Academy - Class 1-A]

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Phew, I made it! Saaya! Rimi-rin! O-Tae! Good morning!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Saaya: Morning. You cut it pretty fine there, Kasumi.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Hehe. I stayed up so late last night, I kinda overslept...

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Rimi: Really...? I'm glad to hear you were studying at least, Kasumi-chan.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Studying? I wasn't studying.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Rimi: Ah...?

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: I was practicing guitar!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Saaya: What? But...

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Tae: That repeat math test is today, after school.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: What? Whose?

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: The Other Three: Yours! Yours, Kasumi-chan...! Yours.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Mine...? ... Ah! I completely forgot!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: [Scene: Arisa's House - Basement]

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: She must be taking the test right about now.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Rimi: I hope she's okay... Teacher said she won't let her leave until she passes...

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Saaya: Well let's hope she passes before the day is done, then.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: I bet she'll still be there when we go in tomorrow.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Tae: Spending the night at school... ... Sounds like fun, actually.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Saaya: I mean, except for the whole test part. ... Anyway. What do we do now? Should we just start without her?

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: Hmm. I guess... Ah...

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: [Scene: Hanasakigawa Girls' Academy - Class 1-A]

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Teacher, here! I finished! It's done!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Math Teacher: Already? That was fast. Let me see. ... Wow. You really did do it.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Arisa helped me study through lunch, so we could practice tonight!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Math Teacher: There's quite a few mistakes in here, but... I'll let it slide. Just remember to study hard next time, okay?

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Okay!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Math Teacher: Practice, huh. You're not in any school clubs, though. ... Oh, the school festival-

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Yes! My band's performing at the school festival! Poppin'Party!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Math Teacher: Pop... What...? Actually, never mind. I'm glad to see you are enjoying yourself. Just don't forget to study.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: I won't! Thanks, teach!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: [Scene: Arisa's House - Basement]

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: ... I'm back! I'm really sorry I kept you all- Huh? I don't hear any music...

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Rimi: Ah, there she is! Welcome back, Kasumi-chan!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Tae: That was quicker than I expected. Good job.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Yeah, thanks. ... What are you all doing? What happened to practice?

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Saaya: Arisa said you'd be out of there in no time, and that we should wait for you. Isn't that right?

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: ...!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Tae: And here you are. Just like she said.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: Y-yeah, well... I mean, obviously! I was the one who helped her study, after all. There's no way she was going to fail again.

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Arisa~!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Arisa: Get off! Gross! You're so annoying! Let's just start practicing already!

chapter_1.title: chapter_1
chapter_1.action: Kasumi: Okay! Come on guys, let's do this!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: [Scene: Arisa's House - Basement]

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Hmmhmm~♪ Hmhmhm~♪ ... Tada~! Yay~! How was that? It was good, right?

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Saaya: Yeah. It was good. Just, Kasumi, you were a little fast at the end, there.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Oh, really?

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Rimi: Should we try it again?

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Okay! Erm... Hmmhmm~♪ Hmhmhm~...

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: Too fast!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Tae: Too, too fast.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Hmm, weird... O-Tae~! What do I do?!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Tae: Don't worry. Just listen to the drums. I'll set the rhythm for you.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Good, okay!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: Kasumi and her "O-Tae Sensei."

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Hehe, good, isn't it~?

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Tae: Sensei...? I don't know about that. I'm here to learn too, you know. It is fun, though.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: Is that so?

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Tae: That's so.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Saaya: It's not easy teaching people... But it's definitely fun to see them improve.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Rimi: Are you talking about Sana-chan?

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Saaya: Yeah. Seeing her passing tests and getting good grades makes all the teaching worthwhile.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Yeah! I know exactly what you mean!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: Your sister is a way better student than you, Kasumi. I bet she's the one teaching you.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Th-that's not true~! I help Aa-chan study all the time!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Rimi: Hehe. I sometimes wish I had a little sister...

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: You have an older sister though, right Rimi-rin?

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Tae: Yuri-san. She's so cool...

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Rimi: She's too cool~! I don't have anything to teach her... I wish I could be like her some day... But that day's still very far away~.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Well, I love you and your bass just the way you are, Rimi-rin!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Rimi: ... Really?

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Really! Without you, Rimi-rin... We just wouldn't be Poppin'Party!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Rimi: Kasumi-chan... Hehe. Thank you.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: ... You really come out with some cheesy stuff, Kasumi.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: I love you too, Arisa~!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: Eugh, stop it! Gross!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Saaya: Haha! Strangers, siblings, whoever. We are who we are, I suppose. We just have to move to our own beat.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Yeah! That's what I've been saying!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: It doesn't mean you can mess up the tempo! That's one beat you have to match up with.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Ahh... I'll try...

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Tae: I like you speeding off like that, Kasumi. It really shows your excitement for the performance.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Really? Then maybe I should keep on-

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Tae: That's not what I meant.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Yeah, I thought not. I'll keep practicing...

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Saaya: We all know this band works exactly because it's the five of us. We just need to get ourselves completely in sync. Don't you want to give a performance that only we are capable of?

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: ...! I do!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Tae: Yeah. Me too.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Rimi: M-me too.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: ... I don't really care.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Arisa~!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: Sh-shut up! You just said we all move to our own beat! Now we have to get completely in sync?!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Saaya: Don't worry, Kasumi. Arisa just gets like this sometimes.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: I do not!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Haha! Oh, right! I bet we can do something just, booom! That makes everyone go, waaaah!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: No idea. English!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Saaya: She wants to do something big, create a movement, and change the world. I think?

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Kasumi: Yeah! Exactly!

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Arisa: And you think our high school band can do that? Change the world... I think we'll only go as far as this town.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Rimi: Hehe. I think even that sounds amazing enough, though.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Tae: Good point.

chapter_2.title: chapter_2
chapter_2.action: Saaya: Hehe. Nothing is impossible, you know. As long as we're with Kasumi, there's always a chance something unexpected will happen.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Hmm-hmm~♪ Okay! Well? What do we think?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Tae: Perfect.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Rimi: It really was! We were all completely in sync with each other.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: You really think so?! What about you, Arisa?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: It was better than yesterday, at least.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Yay! That must mean all our hard work is paying off♪

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: If only you'd try so hard at school, too. You might stop crying before tests.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: ... Ouch...

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Saaya: Your face is a picture, Kasumi.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Saaya! Arisa's being mean! She sounds just like Aa-chan~!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: Your little sister bullies you?!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Tae: Kasumi. Be strong.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Saaya~, can't you do something to cheer me up?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Saaya: Hmm. Something to cheer Kasumi up... ... Well, there is a festival going on-

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: A festival?! Where?!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Saaya: The same place it is every year, in town.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: It's that time of year already, huh.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Rimi: Will your family be taking part again, Saaya-chan?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Tae: Selling bread, I guess...?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Saaya: I imagine so. I mean, we always do. I haven't heard them talk about it yet, though.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Rimi: I really like the candy stall at the festival best.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: The candy stall! Aa-chan told me about it once before!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Rimi: I went with my sister once before... They're so delicious and sweet.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Saaya: Everyone in town just can't wait for it to open.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Tae: Me neither. It's pretty exciting.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: I had no idea.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Rimi: It's really famous.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Tae: They'll make you customized candies, too.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Wait, really?!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: You mean, in any shape you want?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Rimi: Any shape! They're really good at it, too.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: Hmm. Could they make one Kasumi-shaped?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Rimi: Actually, I think they draw caricatures there, too!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Saaya: You can't eat Kasumi, Arisa...

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Wh-what?!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: Th-that's not what I meant!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: If Arisa eats me, I won't be me anymore!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: No one's eating anyone!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Tae: I might eat Arisa.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: Well don't!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Saaya: It's nice to see everyone getting along, at least.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: ... Ah!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: [Scene: Hanasakigawa Girls' Academy - Class 1A]

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Do you think they could make star-shaped candies?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Rimi: Star-shaped?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Yeah! Like our band logo! We could get five made and eat them together!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Tae: Great idea.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Saaya: That would be perfect for us.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Rimi: I think that sounds great. What do you think, Arisa?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: Star-shaped candies? Fine, if you must... It does sound like something we'd do.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Yay! I'm so excited, I can't wait for the festival to start♪

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: Calm down, Kasumi.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Tae: You're excited for your candied Kasumis too though, right?

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Arisa: Enough with the Kasumi candy!

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Saaya: I think that's as good a point as any to stop and get back to practice.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Okay! Hmm-hmm~♪

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Tae: That's the spirit.

chapter_3.title: chapter_3
chapter_3.action: Kasumi: Come on then, everyone! Once more from the top!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: [Scene: Hanasakigawa Girls' Academy - Class 1A]

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Tae: ... It's getting late already.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Rimi: Oh, you're right. I was so focused, I hadn't noticed...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: Maybe we should take this somewhere else.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: Okay! I wanna ask around about that festival, too! I've just gotta know when it starts♪

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: Are you an actual child?

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: I don't think so...?!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Saaya: Haha. You seem even happier than usual today.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Rimi: I think she's just excited about this festival.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: Exactly right, Rimi-rin~♪ But it's not just that! I can't wait for us all to get our special Poppin' Party star candies, too♪

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: Nope. Definitely a child...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: You're gonna join me too, Arisa~!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: G-get off me!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: [Scene: Walking Home]

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: Festival, festival, festival fun~♪

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: We're in public, you know.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Saaya: I can see why she's so excited, though. I'm kind of excited myself. And I bet you are too, Arisa.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: Hmm... Maybe a little.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Rimi: ... Ah.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Saaya: Rimi-rin? What is it?

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Rimi: Huh? I... I... This...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Saaya: This...? Oh. ... Ohh.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Tae: This isn't good.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: A flyer? Let's see here. This year's festival is... canceled?!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Tae: ... That's terrible.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: Canceled?! Why?!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Saaya: I had no idea...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: Wait! Maybe it's a printing error or something!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Rimi: Maybe they just made a mistake...?

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Tae: Maybe it's a conspiracy...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: You're all extremely wrong.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: Everyone makes mistakes, Arisa!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: That is so not what I-

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: We have to go and find out the truth!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Tae: She's right. This is our top priority.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: For the Poppin' Party star candies!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: [Scene: Downtown]

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: There are flyers everywhere here, too...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Tae: On every wall and post.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Rimi: If they've put up this many, I doubt there's any mistake...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Saaya: Jun and Sana were so looking forward to it, too...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: ... I want to know why it was canceled!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Rimi: I would like to find out, too.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: Hey, it's Michelle! She's bound to know what happened!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: What would a pink bear know about anything?

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Tae: There is a person inside, you know.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Rimi: Th-there is?!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Saaya: She's the mascot of this shopping district. She really might know why the festival was canceled.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: Michelle~!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Michelle: ...?!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: Has the festival really been canceled? You have to tell us!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: Bears don't speak, Kasumi.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Tae: Nod for yes, shake for no.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Michelle: ......

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: Ahh~!!

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Rimi: Kasumi-chan...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Saaya: Cheer up, Kasumi...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Tae: None of us wanted this.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: O-Tae... Saaya...

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Arisa: ... I guess that means no star candies, then.

chapter_4.title: chapter_4
chapter_4.action: Kasumi: But I really wanted us to have them~!!

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: [Scene: Downtown]

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: You look like you have something on your mind.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Rimi: I'm still wondering why the festival was canceled...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tae: It must have been something important.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Saaya: I would never have imagined it would get canceled.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: Yeah. So many people were looking forward to it, too. They're all gonna want to know why.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Rimi: I bet more people want it to happen than want it canceled, too...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tae: In other words, it is a conspiracy after all.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: Hrm...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: An unusual grumble from Kasumi. What's the matter now?

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Saaya: I think she's still in shock... Come on Kasumi, cheer up.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: But... but...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tae: There there, Kasumi.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: O-Tae~...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Rimi: It's not going to be the same without the festival this year.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: And without any candies, either.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: The candies... I really wanted us to share them~!

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: Crying isn't going to bring them back.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Saaya: She's just upset after getting so excited.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Rimi: Why would they cancel it so suddenly?

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Saaya: It's everyone's highlight of the year.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: Adults have their reasons, I guess.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tae: Stupid adults.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Rimi: I was looking forward to our special star candies, too...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Saaya: It really was a great idea.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tomoe: Hey, Saaya. Why all the long faces?

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Rimi: Ah... Th-these flyers around town...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tae: They say the festival's been canceled this year. We're all feeling sad about it.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tomoe: Oh, yeah. I was kinda looking forward to it myself.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: I even asked Michelle, and she said it's all true...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: I don't think she "said" anything.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tae: I bet whoever's inside is feeling sad, too.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Rimi: Inside...?!

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Saaya: We were going to ask at the candy stall for some special sweets, but now we won't get the chance...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tomoe: That is a really good stall. I visit it every year.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: The whole town must be upset over all this...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tomoe: I'm sure they are. I know I am.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tae: And we still don't even know the reason why...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: Not unless Michelle starts blabbing.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tomoe: The reason? I heard it was a funding issue.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Rimi: A funding issue...? Really?

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tomoe: Yeah. The town suffered some budget cuts recently, and the festival fund had to be let go.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: Right.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: B-but... everyone enjoys it so much!

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Saaya: They do. It was always filled with people each year.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: So why did they have to cut the budget, then?

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tomoe: I don't think it's for us kids to know, really.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tae: We should find an adult.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: We have to get the truth!

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: Tomoe-san literally just told us the truth.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: But I wanna know the real reason behind it all!

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: Okay, fine! Just get off me already!

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Saaya: I mean... there's nothing we can do about a town budget...

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tae: It just gets sadder and sadder.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tomoe: I'll see you guys later.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Rimi: Thank you, Udagawa-san!

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Saaya: I guess Tomoe was excited for the festival, too.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: So she says.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Tae: Excited for the candy, no doubt.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Arisa: ... Snap out of it, Kasumi. We're losing valuable practice time.

chapter_5.title: chapter_5
chapter_5.action: Kasumi: A~ri~sa~!

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: [Scene: Arisa's House - Basement]

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: Hmph...

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: You look like a hamster, Kasumi. Cheeks all puffed out.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Rimi: She must be feeling really sad.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: Of course I am. I really wanted to go to the festival.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: Well, whoever's in charge decided it must be canceled, so...

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: Do you think that means it won't be on next year either?

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: If there's no budget this year, then there probably won't be next year, no.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Rimi: So no more festivals.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: We can't be certain, but it does look that way.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: But I never even got to go once~!

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: Stop crying. There's plenty of other festivals out there.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: But I wanted to go to this one here!

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Rimi: Kasumi-chan...

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: There's nothing more we can do. Come on, Kasumi.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: She's right. It's time for practice, Kasumi.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: The festival...

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: Kasumi.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: ... Huh? Ah...

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: Were you listening? That sound was way off.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: Her hand wasn't moving.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Rimi: Are you okay, Kasumi-chan?

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: Just leave her. She's still crying over that festival. If you're not gonna focus during practice, I'm just gonna go home.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: Tough love.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: Quiet, you.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Rimi: She really was looking forward to it... I wish we could help, but...

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: What if we made candy here, ourselves?

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: It's way too hard. But you're right, we need to do something. Kasumi's just not the same.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Rimi: I can understand why, though... It really is a shame.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: She was more excited than anyone, that's for sure.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: Let it go. She'll get through it soon enough. I'm not wasting my time worrying about it.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: Hrm... I can't do it! Everyone! I just can't give up like this!

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: See?

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: Wow. You knew she was going to say that, didn't you?

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: I can read her like a book.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: We have to do something! About the festival!

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: We all want to, but... there's not really anything we can do...

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: There must be something! We just have to find it! I just... I really want us to have our star candies...

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: ... You're right. I want them too.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: Me too. Oh and Arisa candy, of course.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Rimi: The more Kasumi-chan mentions it, the more I want it, too!

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: And Arisa wants her Kasumi candy, too.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: No I do not! ... But star candy would be nice, I guess.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: Maybe if we all worked together, we could somehow bring back the festival.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Rimi: Us? But how...?

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: I don't know yet. But I'm gonna think real hard!

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: Try stopping and thinking about what you're saying.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: It's not going to be easy overturning a decision like this.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: Our enemy is too strong.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Rimi: I'm not sure there is anything we can do.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: Hrm...

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: I really can't think of any good ideas.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: Maybe we should take a break.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: Good idea. Not like we were getting any practice done anyway.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: Agreed.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: I'll get us some drinks.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Kasumi: Yay! Something ice cold, please!

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: You...! Ugh, fine. Anything to cool your head.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Saaya: Thanks, Arisa.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Rimi: Do you want me to help, Arisa-chan?

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Tae: I'll go too.

chapter_6.title: chapter_6
chapter_6.action: Arisa: I don't need help. You just wait here.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: [Scene: Arisa's House - Basement]

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: Here. Drink some juice and clear your head.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: I just don't know what to do...

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: ... Not even listening.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Saaya: That's our Kasumi.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Rimi: Ahh, this is delicious. It's nice to take a break.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Tae: A Poppin' Tea Party.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: Not tea, but sure.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: ... I've got it! We should go and ask what they need to bring their budget back up!

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Saaya: Go and ask...? Where?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: The... budget store?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Tae: And where's that?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: You mean city hall?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: Yeah! That's the one!

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Tae: Let's hurry. Everyone get ready.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Rimi: Ah, wait... Are we allowed to just go to city hall...?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Saaya: What if they won't even hear us out?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Tae: ... Turned away at the door.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: Hrm... But where else could we go...?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Saaya: Maybe we should try heading back into town first.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: I guess we could try the community center...

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: If they're the ones with budgets, then let's go! Come on, everyone!!

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: I guess that's practice done for the day, then.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Saaya: You know there's no stopping her now.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Rimi: Fufu. I'm just glad to see her happy again.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Tae: Me too.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: ... Ugh, fine. Let's go on her crazy adventure.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: [Scene: Downtown - Community Center]

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: Hello! We've come to get some budget!

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: ... You are a bonafide idiot.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Saaya: Sorry to drop in like this. My name is Saaya Yamabuki, from Yamabuki Bakery.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Man: Ah, Saaya-chan. And how can I help you today? Something about budgets, was it...?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Rimi: U-umm... It's about the town festival...

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Tae: We're upset that it got canceled.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: We heard it had something to do with budgets being cut.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: So we wanna know how we can get it uncut!

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Man: We have been receiving a lot of correspondence about the festival, and indeed most people are sad to see it go.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: We're not the only ones after all!

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Saaya: Would you consider not cancelling it, then?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Man: I'm afraid the matter is very much out of our hands.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Rimi: Why is that?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Man: As much as we would like to protect our traditions, this decision came down to us from city hall. We have no recourse to fight them.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Tae: ... The elusive city hall.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Rimi: Not even the community can save their own festival...

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: That doesn't sound fair, does it?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Tae: I can't believe it.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: Me neither! Are you okay with this, mister?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Man: No, I can't say I really understand the decision either.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Saaya: Everyone was really looking forward to it.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: Isn't there something we can do?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: City Worker: Perhaps I could be of assistance?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: City Worker: Good evening. You are all students at Hanasakigawa, are you?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Saaya: Yes, we're first years.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: City Worker: Well, I am Community Promotions manager for this city.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Arisa: ... From city hall.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Rimi: Why would someone from city hall be here...?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: City Worker: On business, of course.

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Kasumi: Excuse me! We want a budget to hold our festival again this year!

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Saaya: Everyone has been looking forward to it so much. Is there anything you can do?

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: Rimi: P-please!

chapter_7.title: chapter_7
chapter_7.action: City Worker: Allow me to be perfectly clear. That shopping district will not hold another festival again.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Kasumi: Why... why won't there be any more festivals?!

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: City Worker: Because there are far better ways to make use of our city budget.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Arisa: Better ways...?

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: City Worker: We are planning to add a new station building. It will do a lot more good for all our residents than a festival.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Kasumi: But what about what the people want...?! They all want the festival to go on!

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: City Worker: The people do not know what is good for them. Their feelings are not what is important here!

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Kasumi: Th-that's just...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Saaya: Our families, our friends, everyone in town... We were all so excited for it...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Tae: This is just... too sad...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Rimi: I really wanted to go to the festival...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: City Worker: It has already been decided. For the good of the community, there will be no more festivals. There is nothing to be done about it.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Tae: Like a real-life movie villain...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Rimi: It looks like no one's willing to listen to us...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Arisa: You're wrong... There has to be a way you can bring back the festival. You're just not looking hard enough...!

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Kasumi: Yeah, that's right!

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Tae: I agree.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Saaya: Me too. You should be thinking more about the people.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: City Worker: Oh, honestly... You don't even know what you're saying... This matter is beyond your childish comprehension.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Arisa: Wh-what...?!

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: City Worker: I cannot waste my time with this any longer. Go on, go home.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Rimi: So mean...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Tae: Too blunt...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Saaya: So no one's willing to help us, then...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Kasumi: We can't give up yet! What'll happen to the festival~?

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Man: I'm sorry, girls. He's always been a very difficult person, rarely ever listens to a word we say.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Saaya: It's not looking good... But there must still be a way...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Arisa: Saaya, come with me. Everyone else, too.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Rimi: Arisa-chan, wait!

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Kasumi: Ahh... All my sparkling feelings have just turned to mulch...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Tae: Kasumi, we should go.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Kasumi: O-Tae~...

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Tae: There, there.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Saaya: We'll see you again.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Arisa: ... Our enemy's stronger than we thought.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Saaya: He just had no time for school girls like us.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Tae: Just like the bad guys on TV.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Rimi: He said there's nothing we can do... Is he right...?

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Tae: He should really think more about the people in this community he's always talking about.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Saaya: You're right, but how can we get him to understand...?

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Arisa: I bet he's never even been to the festival. That's why he doesn't understand.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Rimi: If only he could actually take part in it, maybe he'd change his mind.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Arisa: ... You've been surprisingly quiet, Kasumi.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Rimi: ... Are you mad?

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Saaya: She does look upset.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Rimi: Are you okay, Kasumi-chan?

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Kasumi: No! I'm very not okay!

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Arisa: You still sound like the same loud Kasumi to me.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Kasumi: I'm just feeling so... blegh! Like I just wanna shout!

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Tae: I know. Me too.

chapter_8.title: chapter_8
chapter_8.action: Kasumi: All our sparkling, all our heart-pounding... It feels like it's slipping away... I want to do something, but I just...! I just don't know what to do~!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: I just wanna enjoy the festival! I wanna feel my heart beat to the sparkle, Arisa~!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: C-calm down, will you?

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: I wanna get rid of this icky feeling!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Rimi: It doesn't feel right leaving things this way, does it...

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: I think we all feel the same.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: I'm more annoyed that man was so rude to us back there...

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: We didn't stand a chance...

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Saaya: It doesn't feel good to be so helpless.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: Well, there's no point in feeling sorry for ourselves. We need to come up with a plan.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: Arisa! Are you finally with me?

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: I-I mean... we can't just give up, right? We finally found out who our enemy is.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Rimi: Enemy...

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: The people from the city office?

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Saaya: I don't know about "enemy"... But they are definitely the ones we need to convince.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Rimi: So now we just need to think of how to convince them!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: The final step in our plan.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: We can do it! If we all work together, I know we can do it!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: For the community... It's time we had a strategy meeting.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: Strategy meeting! Great idea, O-Tae!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: With some croquettes to help us think.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: Croquettes! Even better idea! We can eat and eat and eat and think!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Saaya: Less eating, more thinking, I hope.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: Okay, okay~! But first things first, let's eat!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: So fast.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Rimi: I'll try one too.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: ... *nom!* Ahh! So good!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Saaya: This place really does have the best croquettes in town.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: And they're cheap, too.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: Not bad at all.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: Another one!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: You'll get fat.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: Oof...

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: I'm getting another.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Rimi: I think I'll have another one, too.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: ...!! Then I'm gonna get one, too!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Saaya: There you go, Arisa.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: I'm good, thanks.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: If we all get fat together, there's no worry.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Saaya: Not that any of us want to, exactly.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: Arisa~! We've gotta eat together, come on~!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: ... Fine. Just this once.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: Operation Fatten Up Arisa, success.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Saaya: Anyway, as we were saying, the festival...

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: Let's protest! We'll sit out in the shopping district until they give in!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: That'll have the complete opposite effect, you know.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Rimi: We could collect donations to fund the festival?

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Saaya: We would never get enough in time. We don't even know how much we'd need...

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: Under cover of dark... we strike them in their sleep... It won't be easy, but...

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Kasumi: O-Tae, that's way too dangerous~!

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Rimi: We can't come up with any ideas at all.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Saaya: I don't know what to do...

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Tae: ... I guess it's just too big a task for high schoolers like us.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Arisa: I hate to admit it, but I think you're right.

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: Rimi: Maybe it is impossible after all...

chapter_9.title: chapter_9
chapter_9.action: All: Hrm...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: [Scene: A Few Days Later]

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Arisa~! Good morning~!

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: Get off me!

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: You know you want a hug~♪

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: Not in public, and not ever.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Rimi: Good morning Kasumi-chan, Arisa-chan.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Rimi-rin! Morning~♪

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Rimi: I hope we can all think up a great new plan today.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: It's been a while already, huh.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Time keeps slipping away!

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Saaya: Good morning everyone.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Saaya~! O-Tae, too!

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Tae: Morning.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Saaya: Did anyone come up with any good ideas?

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: No, none...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Saaya: Yeah. I don't have any either.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: ... Okay! Let's all think about it during the day and meet up again after class!

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Tae: What if we can't think of anything?

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Hrm... you get punished.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Rimi: What...?

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Like for example, Rimi-rin would have to go without cornets.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Rimi: Wh-what?! No, please no... That's torture...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Okay then, how about getting hugged by me for an entire day?

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: Now that's torture.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Saaya: Sounds like daily life.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Tae: What's your punishment then, Kasumi?

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Hrm... No hugging anyone for an entire day, I guess.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: Is that even possible?

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Nope! Definitely not!

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Tae: As long as we each come up with something, we'll be okay.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Saaya: We'd better get our thinking caps on, then.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Come on guys, we can do it! I'll see you after school!

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: [Scene: School Path]

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: ... So? Did anyone come up with anything?

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Hrm...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Rimi: I... didn't think of anything...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Tae: Still working on it.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Saaya: I'm ready to give up.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: Useless, all of you.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: What about you, Arisa? Did you think of a plan?

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: ... No.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: That makes none of us, then...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Saaya: I think we've reached our limit.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Tae: I need to guitar these bad feelings out of me.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Hearing O-Tae's guitar just makes me want to sing!

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: [Scene: After School]

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Twinkle twinkle...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Saaya: Little star...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Rimi: How I wonder...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: ... What you are.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Tae: Great. We should do that more often.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: ... Tch.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Haha! All of us, twinkle-twinkling♪

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Tae: I didn't expect all of you to sing.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Rimi: I didn't either. I just heard Kasumi-chan singing, and...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Arisa: She swept me up in her deceptive sparkly wave, too.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Saaya: It just shows that we really are all feeling the same feelings right now.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Rimi: It was a lot of fun.

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: ... That's it! Guys, I've got it! This feeling... You know what this is, right? It's the real spirit of the festival!

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Tae: What we're feeling right now...

chapter_10.title: chapter_10
chapter_10.action: Kasumi: Five friends, spending time together, laughing and getting to know each other... Fun and happiness just growing day by day...! That's the most important thing of all!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: I know you're on a roll right now Kasumi, but just calm down...

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: I can't! I can't calm down!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: I'm saying you're losing it, Kasumi.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Saaya: We know exactly what you mean, Kasumi.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Right?!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Rimi: Of course. We all felt it, singing together like that♪

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Yay! I'm so glad you understand, Rimi-rin♪

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Tae: Sharing moments like this is what's really important.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Sharing...! I wanna share this feeling with everybody! This sparkling, heart-pounding feeling!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Saaya: That was the whole reason for having a festival in the first place, too.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: I get it. I do, really.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Saaya! Arisa! I'm so happy we're all on the same page♪

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Saaya: Of course we are. We're all here together because of you, Kasumi.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: You are?

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Rimi: No one else would have brought this band together.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Tae: All thanks to you, Kasumi.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: I was more dragged against my will, but still.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Saaya: We can never forget what's most important of all. That we are all here together.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Yes! I love you all so much~♪

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: She's gone past crazy into creepy, now.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Tae: You're blushing.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Rimi: I feel like we're all closer than ever before.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Saaya: I hope we get to feel like this a lot more in future, too.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Let's make every day more exciting than the last!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: Not every day, please. I don't need the stress.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Come on~! We're talking about fun~! Lots and lots of happy, chatty fun~♪

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: Like I said, stress.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Tae: You're blushing again.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: I am not!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Saaya: I just hope we can get the city office people to understand this feeling, too.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Rimi: I think the people from the shopping district will... But the city office is still going to be difficult...

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Tae: The final step in our plan.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Rimi: I know it will be tough, but I don't want to give up.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: Even so, it does look pretty much impossible...

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Hrm... What should we do...?

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Rimi: Something only we can do...

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Tae: Hmm... Tough one.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Saaya: It's not easy changing someone's mind when they're already so decided on something...

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: ... I've got it!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: Veto.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: But I haven't even explained it yet!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: Sorry, just a natural reflex. ... Well go on, then.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Okay, so! We have to express these feelings the only way we can, right?

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Tae: The only way we can.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: With a performance! We can perform for all the community and the city hall people, too!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa, Rimi, Tae & Saaya: Perform?

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: It's what we do best! We can express our true feelings through song!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: There she goes again...

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Tae: I'm not sure how the message will get across.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: It will, I know it will! If we just try hard enough, it'll all work out!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Saaya: It'll all work out... Confident as always, Kasumi.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Rimi: I think it's a really good idea, Kasumi-chan. I bet it will be really exciting, too.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: A live performance... I suppose it could be a little fun.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: What do you think? ... Can we do it?

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Tae: I think we should try.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Saaya: I agree. If only just to see how another Kasumi's plan turns out.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Rimi: It was a burst of inspiration from Kasumi-chan that formed our band in the first place, after all.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: Just promise me you won't go crazy trying to do everything at once, like you always do.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Arisa~!

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Arisa: And promise to get off of me, too! ... I'll just have to keep an eye on you myself, then.

chapter_11.title: chapter_11
chapter_11.action: Kasumi: Thank you, everyone! We finally got a plan together!!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: [Scene: After School]

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: School's out! Time to go find Arisa!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Saaya: Didn't she tell you to wait here for her?

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: I'll be back soon~♪

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Tae: Bring back souvenirs.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Rimi: She disappeared...

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Saaya: It couldn't be more obvious how excited she is to get back downtown.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Rimi: Today is the day we ask for permission to perform live. I'm a little nervous myself.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Tae: Nervous. But excited.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Saaya: We have to be brave. We need to get our feelings heard.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Tae: I'm filling up with motivation already.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Rimi: I just hope it all goes well...

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: I'm back~! Here's your souvenir - Arisa♪

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Arisa: Good afternoon to you all.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Tae: And to you. ... She's angry.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Rimi: She's definitely angry.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: She is? Are you?

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Arisa: I'm pretty sure I told you to wait in your classroom after school.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: I just couldn't wait another second to see you♪

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Arisa: That does not make it any better.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Saaya: She just loves you that much, Arisa.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: Exactly right~♪

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Tae: Everyone loves Arisa.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Arisa: Actual living hell.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Saaya: If we're all here then, let's head downtown.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: Okay! To the battlefield!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Tae: We fight.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: [Scene: Hanasakigawa Girls' Academy - Class 1A]

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: It's beggin' time!!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Arisa: Quiet, you.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Rimi: H-hello there.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Man: Oh? It's you girls, from before...?

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Saaya: We would like to apologize for the other day.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Tae: Do you have a moment to speak with us?

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Rimi: We have something we really need to tell you...

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: People: Something important, is it?

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Arisa: Go on, Kasumi.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: Okay! We've come to ask about the town festival!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: People: The canceled festival, you mean?

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: Exactly!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Man: I believe the gentleman from the city office informed us all that he had nothing more to say on the matter.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Saaya: He did. And that is why we are here to ask a favor...

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: We want to perform live!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: People: Perform live...?

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Tae: The five of us are in a band.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Rimi: W-we're Poppin'Party!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Arisa: We want to perform at the festival. Would you please put it back on?

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: People: Nothing would please us more. But I'm afraid it's simply not possible...

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: [Scene: Downtown]

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Rimi: Please! If you say it's impossible, we'll have to give up!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Saaya: There are a lot of people looking forward to this festival. None of us want it to be canceled.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Arisa: If you let us perform, we promise to make this year's festival the most amazing one yet.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Tae: We'll give it 110%.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Rimi: We won't let you down! Just, please, give us a chance...!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: Everyone, please! Let us perform for you!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Man: To be asked with such passion from young girls such as you.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: People: We all want to see the festival go on as planned, too.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Man: ... Okay. If you wouldn't mind it being a relatively small affair, we can hold the festival again this year.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: Really?!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Rimi: Thank you so much! Ah, but... the budget...

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Man: You just leave the finances to us!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Saaya: And what about next year...?

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: People: Without designated funding from the city, next year will be an impossible stretch without doubt.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Man: But if we can put on a real show this year and gather all manner of people, perhaps the city suits will finally change their minds.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Kasumi: So this is our final chance!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Tae: Lots of pressure. But we won't give in.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Arisa: Are you kidding? We'll make this the best festival anyone's ever seen.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: Saaya: Thank you all so much for your help!

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: People: We're counting on you. And we'll all be looking forward to your performance.

chapter_12.title: chapter_12
chapter_12.action: All: Okay!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Saaya: Thanks again, everyone.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: ... We did it!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Rimi: Ahh, I was so nervous~...

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Tae: You did great, Rimi.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: You said everything just perfect! I think you really moved them all back there♪

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Rimi: I could only do it because all of you were there to support me.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: You were great. We all were.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Saaya: This is just the beginning, though.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: I hope you understand what this means, Kasumi.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: Huh? What what means?

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: If this festival isn't perfect, there won't be another one. Ever.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Rimi: He did say this was our last chance... Are we really sure we can do it?

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Saaya: I think the folks at the community center are going to be paying out of pocket... We cannot let them down.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Tae: We've come this far. We have to keep going.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: We can do it!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: Easier said than done. This is a whole festival we're talking about here.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: And I know we can do it♪ With all of us working together it'll be no problem!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Saaya: It's like Rimi-rin said. It's something only we five can do.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: Exactly! There's no way I could do this all by myself♪

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Tae: Teamwork made this happen.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Rimi: Now we know the festival is coming back, next we need to focus on our performance!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: It's not like we have any choice any more.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Tae: Time for another strategy meeting?

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: Great idea! Let's strategize!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Saaya: We've still got some time left. Let's go somewhere to think.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: Let's go, let's go♪

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: [Scene: Hazawa Coffee]

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: Wow~♪

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Saaya: This place has the best chiffon cake.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Rimi: They're all homemade, too. Delicious♪

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: ... I guess it's not bad. The five of us out together like this.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Tae: Our own happy moment...

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: Ogeh, leff ftar duh hftraferdy eedin~!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: Nope. Didn't catch a word. Eat or speak, pick one.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: Sorry, sorry. They're just too good to stop. Okay, let's start the strategy meeting~!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: Right. Go on then.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: We can't just get up there and start playing. We have to do all kinds of preparation first!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Saaya: We should plan it all out, step by step.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Tae: So we don't get all in a panic later on.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: Wait, wait. I'll take notes. So we check our instruments, then go on stage...

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Rimi: Should we talk a little before we start playing?

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: With the audience, you mean? We'll need to decide where to stand and what to say, then.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: Oh, oh! And we should sparkle, and twinkle, and shine!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: Sparkle, twinkle, shine... Next.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Tae: We should do something to make the whole community happy.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: Something to make everyone happy. Something fun.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Saaya: It would be a great way to show our appreciation for all the work they are doing for us with the festival.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Rimi: Plus our performance should carry that message, too.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Tae: Definitely. Very important.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: Arisa~! Did you write down my sparkling heart-pounding?

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: Yes, now shush. I've heard all your suggestions. Here's what I think. If we just get up there, sing our song and say goodbye, we're only going to entertain people for a short amount of time. I think we should create something new. A theme song for the whole festival.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: A theme song?!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: We haven't got much time. But hey, we can do anything, right?

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Tae: Anything.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Rimi: That's a wonderful idea, Arisa-chan! Let's write a new song♪

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Saaya: That should definitely please the community, too.

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: It's decided, then?

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Kasumi: It's decided! A new Poppin'Party original song... Let's make it sparkle!!

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Rimi, Tae & Saaya: Yeah~♪

chapter_13.title: chapter_13
chapter_13.action: Arisa: This is a public place, you know. ... They're not listening.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Saaya: A new song for the festival... I suppose now we figure out how to actually write it.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: What do you mean? We'll just write it together, like always.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: Of course we will. The problem is time. We can't be wasting any of it right now.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Rimi: Y-you're right. If we want to practice too, we'll have to hurry.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Tae: We'll have to focus.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Focus!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Tae: Exactly. Just focus on the song. If we can do that, we'll be finished in no time.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: Even so...

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: ... Ah!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Rimi: Kasumi-chan?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Fufu~. I just had an amazing idea~.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Saaya: What is it?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: A retreat! We should all take a songwriting retreat! We can all go away somewhere together and spend the whole night just working on the song!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Rimi: Wow...!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Tae: Great idea...!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: That is... terrible, actually. Hold on a minute. Go away? Go away where, exactly?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: To the seaside!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Tae: To the mountains!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: That's not what I meant! I mean how are we going to organize something like this?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Saaya: Hmm. Even if we booked a place right now, we still wouldn't get everything prepared in time...

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Rimi: It'll cost us a lot of money, too...

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Hrm... You're right. ... We could get jobs?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Saaya: The whole problem is we don't have enough time. We can't spend what time we have working, can we?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Rimi: That is a shame... I was looking forward to going away together...

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Tae: Me too.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Hrm... We need somewhere close by and open. Somewhere that won't cost us any money.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Saaya: That's also big and soundproofed. If we want to practice, I mean.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Hrm...

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: Well that's just impossible, so there's no point even thinking.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: ... I've got it! I know where we can go!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Rimi: R-really? Where?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Here! Arisa's house!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: Hah. ... Wait, you're serious?!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Saaya: I dunno... I think it's a good idea.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: Huh?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Tae: It fits all the specs. Close, open, big, soundproof.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Saaya: All we need now is her family's permission.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: Wh-what...?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Please, Arisa!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Rimi: Arisa-chan! Please!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: Stop with the begging! It's not making this any easier...

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Aww~...

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: ......! Okay, fine! Fine! If there's really no other option... I'll go ask my grandma.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
