chapter_14.action: Kasumi: You will?!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: I'll ask, sure. But if she says no, then the answer's no. And I'll warn you now, don't go getting your hopes up!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Thanks, Arisa~!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Rimi: Thank you!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Saaya: ... I think we can get our hopes up a little. Fufu.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Tae: Arisa's too kind.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: She is! She really is!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: Enough with all that! Flattery will get you nowhere!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: [Scene: Arisa's House - Basement]

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Saaya: Arisa didn't come to school again today.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: I wonder what her grandma said about the retreat... Oh, I just got a message from her! "Come to Hazawa Coffee. Bring the others."

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Rimi: I wonder what it could be...

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: [Scene: The Next Day]

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: There you are.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Arisa! How did it go...?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: [Scene: Hazawa Coffee]

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: Here.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: ... Wah! What is it? A key?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: This weekend. Saturday and Sunday.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: Huh...?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: You're the one in charge, so you take the key. Don't come crying to me if something happens.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: ...!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Rimi: Does that mean...?

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: ... Just make sure you don't disturb the neighbors.

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Kasumi: ... Ya~y! We got our retreat~!!

chapter_14.title: chapter_14
chapter_14.action: Arisa: Th-that is exactly what I don't want you to do at my place!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: [Scene: Day Of The Retreat]

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Good morning, everyone~! Time for us to enjoy our songwriting retreat!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: So loud, so early.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Saaya: There she is. Good morning.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Rimi: Good morning, Arisa-chan. Thanks again for letting us stay.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: Uhh, Kasumi? Rimi? What's the matter with you two? You're never normally this formal when you come over.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: It's a retreat.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Exactly! A retreat! It's not like our normal hangout, is it?!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: Loud, too loud... At least you're not being rude, I guess.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Mami: Welcome, welcome. Please, enjoy your stay.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Ah, Arisa's grandma! Thanks so much for letting us stay here!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Mami: Oh, don't mention it. I'll bring you some drinks down to the basement. Is juice okay?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: You don't have to wait on us, grandma. Come on, let's get started. You brought the basement key, right leader?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Sure did! It's right... erm... huh...

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Rimi: Ah...?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Oh wait, wrong pocket! Here it is! Phew~!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: My heart skipped a beat.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: ... You're lucky you found it...

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: [Scene: Arisa's House]

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Saaya: Okay then. Let's start with the lyrics. I suppose we'll just brainstorm ideas together first?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Okay! Well, it's a town festival, right? So we should include stuff about the town!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: A surprisingly good idea.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Fufu~♪

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Rimi: I'm... not sure how we can sing about the town, though...

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Huh? Oh, hrm...♪ Kitazawa Butcher's croquettes~♪ Hot, crunchy and oh-so delicious~♪ Each one just 86 yen plus tax~♪

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Saaya: Haha. I think that's more a commercial than a song.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: ... No good?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: I liked it.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: Nope, no good at all. I can already picture that city suit's smug face. We're gonna need something better than that.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Rimi: Something better... Maybe a more serious topic...?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: Love.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi, Arisa, Saaya & Rimi: Love?!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: Of all humankind.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Too serious!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Saaya: From croquettes to humanity... That's quite a jump.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Rimi: I-I think we need something a little more simple... I know about chocolate cornets, at least...

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: Love is too hard.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Saaya: I think we need something people can relate to. That'll be what makes them truly happy, too.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Something relatable... to make a happy festival... Hrm...

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: [Scene: Arisa's House - Basement]

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Saaya: ... Wow. It's getting dark already. How do we look, Kasumi?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Mmm... It's not looking good.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: The melody is coming along.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Rimi: I'm sorry, Kasumi-chan. We all got so focused on the melody, we didn't come up with any lyric ideas...

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: At least we came up with something though, right? Anyway, we should probably start getting ready for dinner.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Ah! Dinner! We're all gonna make it together, right?!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: Of course. I'm not asking grandma to make food for six. You're free to use the kitchen. Just don't mess it up.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: I won't~! Fufu, this is gonna be so much fun~!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: [Scene: A Few Hours Later]

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi, Tae & Rimi: Itadakima~su!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Saaya: This is good. I know it's just a regular curry, but it tastes so much better knowing we all made it together.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: Arisa's chopped vegetables look like perfect little dice.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: I just don't like them being all misshapen. ... Like this giant piece of potato! Kasumi!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Congrats Arisa, you got the bonus one~♪

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: The bonus one...? You seem pretty relaxed for someone who hasn't thought up any lyrics yet. It's almost night time!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Ah!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Rimi: Oh, wow... Today has gone by so quickly.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: Time flies...

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: Like an arrow.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: That's the one.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Saaya: I think I prefer "when you're having fun." We've just been enjoying ourselves so much.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: You're right. But I feel like that every day. Ever since I met you guys, every day has gone by so quickly, like a shooting star!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Rimi: I think... I feel the same. I think about it after practice. How much I wish we could just stay together like this...

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Saaya: We should all cherish these moments. We're so lucky to be able to spend time with great friends like this, you know?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: I know. I'm glad I was invited.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Hehe. Aren't you glad we both stayed behind after home ec that time, O-Tae?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Tae: It was a blessing in disguise. ... What about you, Arisa?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Arisa: Me? I... don't really... Well, I mean... It's not the worst time ever, I guess. Being together with you guys.

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: Ah!

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Saaya: Kasumi? What is it?

chapter_15.title: chapter_15
chapter_15.action: Kasumi: This is it! This is what the lyrics should be! We should sing about friendship! About being happy that we all have each other! It's the perfect way to bring everyone together at the festival!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: [Scene: Arisa's House - Arisa's Room]

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Whew~♪ That was a nice bath~!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Saaya: You sure took your time. Me and Rimi-rin were worried you'd drowned.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Sorry~. I did kind of fall asleep for a bit.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Rimi: Well, you did work so hard today, Kasumi-chan.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: All that thinking really tired me out~!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Saaya: I'm just glad we managed to get the lyrics finished. All that's left is to match it up with the melody. ... That's still quite a big task, though.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Come on guys, we've come this far! We'll get right back to it tomorrow! Right, Saaya? Rimi-rin?

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Rimi: Right!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Saaya: We should probably get some sleep, then.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Tae: I laid out the beds.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Thanks, O-Tae! Shotgun this one! Kasumi Dive♪

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Arisa: Oi, don't jump on the beds.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Haha! But they're so soft and warm~.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Tae: She'll sleep well tonight.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Arisa: That's good. I think I might turn in, too. I'm feeling tired myself.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Can we please, though... have just a little pillow fight?

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Arisa: Go to bed.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: I will! But I mean, this is kind of a slumber party, right? We can't just go straight to bed like this, can we~?

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Rimi: She does have a point...

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: [Scene: The Next Day]

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Arisa: I don't see where pillow fighting comes into this. You're not an actual child, are you?

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Tae: Hya!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Arisa: Ow. ... You're gonna regret that!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Tae: Caught it. Kasumi, catch.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Nice pass! Here we go~! Hya~!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Saaya: Wah! Hey, come on, why me~?

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Join in, Saaya! Come on~!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Saaya: ... Okay, but just a little. Catch, Rimi-rin!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Rimi: Huh? M-me~?!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Whew... Now that was fun.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Arisa: Ahh... phew... Look at the time... Have you finally had enough now? I'm turning out the lights.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Saaya: Go ahead~.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: ...... ... Anyone else just get wide awake as soon as it goes dark?

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Arisa: No. Sleep.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Tae: Time for a ghost story. This is a true story, from my cousin's friend's coworker...

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Rimi: Gulp...

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Arisa: Boring~. I'm going to sleep. All the way to sleep.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Rimi: Me too... I... I... *yawn~*...

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Aww. Okay. Good night, everyone.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Saaya: Mmm. Night.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: ...... ... Saaya? Arisa? Rimi-rin? ... Are you all asleep?

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Tae: What is it, Kasumi?

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: I can't get to sleep.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Tae: ... Are you worried about the song?

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: No, it's not that. I'm excited. I'm excited to hear what we've created. And I'm just sure it's gonna be heart-pounding.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Tae: Me too. With the five of us working hard, it's sure to be great. I bet they all feel the same, too.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Yeah... Yeah, you're right. Okay! Back to it tomorrow!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Tae: Tomorrow. Good night...

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: [Scene: Arisa's House - Basement]

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: ~♪

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Rimi: ... Did we do it?

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: We did it! We did the whole song! It's finished~!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Saaya: Great. Well done everyone. I'm so glad we got it all done in time~...

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Arisa: It's already evening, though. All Kasumi's playing around last night left me tired all day. *yawn~*...

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: I'm sorry~. But at least we got it done! Now we can sleep all we want tonight~!

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Saaya: We do have school tomorrow, after all.

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Kasumi: Oh right, yeah...

chapter_16.title: chapter_16
chapter_16.action: Rimi: Fufu. Be careful not to oversleep.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: [Scene: A Few Days Later]

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: Ahh... I'm getting nervous. I really hope this goes well.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Rimi: I-it will. If we ask strongly and politely, the man from the city office is sure to understand.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Arisa: I dunno.That man is the embodiment of these city suit types. I bet when we try to invite him, he'll tell us how it's "out of office hours" or something.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: If that happens...

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Rimi: If that happens...?

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: We'll just have to ask even harder!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Arisa: Yeah, great plan. There's gotta be a better way. Maybe something less pushy.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Tae: Pushy is the Kasumi way.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: Yeah! If pushing doesn't work, you push again, and harder!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Arisa: ... Right. I guess you stick with what you're used to, huh. If anything they should understand pressure tactics anyway.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: Okay. Let's go! Excuse me~!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Tae: We're coming in.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Rimi: I-I don't think they need a warning...

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: [Scene: Downtown]

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: Hello~? Is the city man...? No, wait, I mean...

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Saaya: Is the City Office Community Promotions manager here today?

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Man: I thought I heard some lively young voices. The manager is currently in a meeting out the back. It appears he's willing to rethink the festival cancellation.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Tae: Really? Thank you very much.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Man: At least, that is the rumor...

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: Oh... It's you five again. What can I help you with now? I'm afraid I don't have much time for the public today.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Arisa: (Says the city suit standing in a local community center...)

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: Umm... We have something to ask you!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: And what might that be? I do hope it isn't about budgeting again. I have nothing more to say on the matter.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: It's not the budget... it's the festival itself! We would really love for you to be there!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: Oh, I see. Well, I'm afraid I'll be too busy with the station rebuild.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Saaya: So, you won't come?

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Arisa: You're the one deciding if the festivals return or not, aren't you? But you're not even gonna come and see how it goes?

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: I'll receive detailed reports after the event regarding attendance and sales, which shall be more than enough for me to make my decision.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: No it won't!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: ...?

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: It won't be enough at all. You have to come and see it for yourself!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Tae: It's the same for any performance. You never truly experience it until you feel the atmosphere yourself.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: Yes, well, that may be the case... However, as I mentioned, I already have plans.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: You must understand my position. I am a mediator, I make decisions based on facts. Staying one step removed keeps me fair and impartial.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Arisa: Always with an answer...

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Saaya: What do you think, Kasumi? It looks like we're about done here.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: Hrm~...

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: If you'll excuse me. I have a number of matters that need attending to.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Man: Excuse me, sir. We really do wish you would attend, if only for a moment.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: ...!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Man: These girls have worked so hard for the festival. So much that they even started rubbing off on us here, too. Forget budgets, forget decisions. This is a matter of adults showing their appreciation for the efforts of the young.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: Mmm...

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Rimi: ... P-please! We're doing our absolute best!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: Please!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: ... Fine. If only just to make sure I don't hear of this again. I will make a brief appearance at the festival.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: You will?!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Arisa: There had to be a better way to say that...

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Saaya: Well, the important thing is that he's said he'll come.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Rimi: H-here! It's the festival program! We'll be performing our own live show...!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: We wrote a new song, just for the festival! We really hope you'll come and listen to it!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: City Worker: ... Will that be all? If so, I shall excuse myself.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Arisa: He really is the worst, that guy.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: Oh, and thank you so much for helping us back there!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Man: We just want to do all we can to help. Did you really create a whole new song? I am amazed you found the time.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Tae: We spent all of last weekend on a songwriting retreat. We worked night and day.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: It's a really, really great song! I just can't wait for everyone here to hear it!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Man: Well, we're all very excited, too. We'll do our best to make the festival as grand as possible.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Saaya: Does it look like you'll be ready in time?

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Man: It does. Everyone has been working hard at it. It looks like we'll have just enough stalls out, too. Including the candy one.

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: Really? The candy stall will be there?!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Rimi: Kasumi-chan! That's wonderful!

chapter_17.title: chapter_17
chapter_17.action: Kasumi: It is! It really is! We can finally make our Poppin'Party star candy!!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: [Scene: Festival Day]

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: It's festival time~!!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Rimi: Wow... L-look at all the people!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Arisa: No kidding. I did not expect all of this...

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Saaya: I spoke to someone from the community center, they said there's twice the usual number of people here this year.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tae: Incredible.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Rimi: But why this year, though? Everything is more or less the same as usual...

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Saaya: I guess everyone was just so pleased to hear the festival wasn't being canceled after all... Word must have spread very fast. A lot of people probably hadn't even realized the festival was in any kind of danger in the first place.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Rimi: And so they all came... because it may be the last time?

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tae: That might be true for some. I don't think anyone wants the festival canceled.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Arisa: Looks like all that hard work was worth it at least. Right, Kasumi? ... Kasumi? Where is she?

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: Hey, guys! Look! Ring toss! And over here, ball scooping! Come on, let's play~!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Arisa: She's lost it...

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Saaya: We still have some time before the show. Let's have some fun while we're here.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tae: Agreed. Let's hit every stall. Cotton candy, yakisoba, hot dogs...

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Rimi: Y-you're going to eat all of that before the show...?

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: Rimi-rin~! Can I have a bite of your candy apple? I'll give you one takoyaki for it!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Rimi: Okay~. There you go, Kasumi-chan.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: Thanks! *nom* ... Ahh~! Delicious~!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Arisa: The food stalls at these festivals sell pretty ordinary stuff, but for some reason, you just wanna eat it all when you get here.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Saaya: It's all about the atmosphere. Not what you eat, but where.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tae: Same for a live show. You don't hear it, you feel it.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: With friends too, of course!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Arisa: This friend's telling you you've got food all over your mouth. Please promise me you won't get up on stage looking like that.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tomoe: Hey.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Saaya: Ah, Tomoe!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tomoe: I heard you were the ones who brought the festival back.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Rimi: Th-that's not entirely true... We just asked if there was any way it could return... The people from the community center did the real work.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tomoe: Even so. You're the ones who spoke up, stood strong and got everyone else to follow. That's not something just anyone can do. You should be proud.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: Hehehe... You're making me blush~. Oh, right! We'll be performing live soon! You should come and listen! Here, take a program!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tomoe: A live show...? Huh.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tae: It'll be great. I hope you enjoy it.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tomoe: Yeah, I'm sure I will. I'll call Ran and the others, we'll all come and watch!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Arisa: ... Speaking of which. We should probably be getting ready, you know.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: Is it that time already?

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Saaya: ... Wow, it is. We got carried away at the stalls. Come on, we should get going.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tae: But I didn't get to see it all yet... Ah. Kasumi, look.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: What is it, O-Tae? ... Ah!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Rimi: The candy stall...! It's so popular, it's completely surrounded by little kids.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Saaya: I'm so glad they got to enjoy it again. Right, Kasumi?

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: Yeah. ... But it's not over yet.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Arisa: ... You're right. We still don't know what'll happen next year.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: Then let's go and make this show so amazing that they just have to let the festival go on!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Rimi: Yeah, okay!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Tae: Let's go. The stage awaits.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: [Scene: Downtown]

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Saaya: Sorry we kept you waiting. Are we all ready to go?

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Man: Hm... Oh, it's you guys. The thing is... there has actually been a problem.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Rimi: ...? What is it...?

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Man: Well...

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: City Worker: Allow me to explain.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Arisa: Ugh. There he is.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: City Worker: ... You did insist I attend.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: City Worker: Anyway. A complaint was filed this morning to city office. "Excessively loud disturbance heard downtown," it read.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Saaya: A complaint...?!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: B-but... what does that mean for us...?

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: City Worker: Our job is to protect the rights and needs of our citizens, that they may live their lives in peace and comfort.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: City Worker: Any acts that may disturb that peace - say, for example, live band performances - are henceforth forbidden.

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Rimi: Ah...

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Arisa: What?!

chapter_18.title: chapter_18
chapter_18.action: Kasumi: You mean... we can't perform our show?!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: Sigh... We've come so far, and now we can't perform...

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Arisa: I bet there wasn't ever any complaint.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Saaya: At least the festival didn't get canceled again, I suppose...

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Tae: ... This sucks.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Rimi: Kasumi-chan... What do we do now?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: Hrm... ... Okay, I got it!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Saaya: Got it? Got what?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: We'll go and speak to whoever complained. We'll apologize... and we'll explain how important it is that we perform today!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Arisa: And how do you plan on doing that? We have no idea who sent the complaint. Even if we did know, why would they listen to us?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Saaya: I think Arisa's right. But still... we can't just stand here doing nothing.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Rimi: E-exactly. We got the festival brought back because we never once gave up. We just have to try again...!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Tae: It might be worth a shot.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: ... Saaya, Rimi-rin, O-Tae! Thank you! And Arisa...

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Arisa: I-I'm not saying we shouldn't try! Anyway... I hate the idea of that city suit getting his way like this. Let's stick it to him!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: Phew~! Thank you, Arisa! ... Huh? Is that Michelle?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Arisa: What?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Michelle: ......

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Rimi: Is she beckoning us over...?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Tae: I think she is.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Michelle: ......

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Saaya: I think she wants us to follow her.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: Weird... Let's see what she wants.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: [Scene: Downtown - Festival Offstage]

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Man: Oh, I'm so glad you're all still here.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Saaya: Michelle found us and lead us back here... Is something the matter?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Man: Nothing is the matter, no. I wanted you to hear the sound of the crowd gathered at the stage.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Rimi: At the stage...?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kid's Voice: Wasn't there gonna be a band or something?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Man's Voice: Maybe it got canceled. Shame, I was kinda looking forward to it...

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Girl's Voice: They're the girls from the Hanasakigawa School Festival, right? I really wanted to hear them perform again~.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Tae: All those people, excited for our show.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Man: Your performance was the highlight of the evening. We even pulled some strings to help spread the word about it.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Saaya: You did...?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: I just want to be allowed to perform...

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Arisa: We all do. And we have so many people out there waiting to hear us, and still...! Take a look at the crowd out there. See for yourself.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: City Worker: What are you trying to say?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Arisa: Your community is out here enjoying the festival. They're out there waiting for our show. You're supposed to be in charge of community events, right? Yet all you've done is cancel and destroy and ruin any fun these people try to have.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: City Worker: That's not quite---

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Man: Sir. I believe these young girls are right. It is easy to take things away just because you do not like them.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Tae: But you'll be taking away the people's happiness. Leaving only... sadness.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Man: We will deal with the noise complaint ourselves, and I will personally take full responsibility. Please, just let these girls perform.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: City Worker: ......

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: City Worker: ... Fine. But if anything happens, you'll be hearing from the city office.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Arisa: Wait...

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: So...?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: City Worker: So you'd better get out on stage and create a great deal more noise.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: ... Yay!!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Rimi: Th-thank you so much!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Tae: Let's go, Kasumi. Everyone.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: Okay! Come on, guys! It's time to play~!!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: [Scene: Downtown - Festival Stage]

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: Hello everyone! We're Poppin'Party! We're sorry we kept you all waiting like this. Thank you so much for coming out here today! Are you all enjoying the festival~? This festival... it was due to be canceled this year. But now we're here, the community center folks are here, and you guys...

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Tomoe: ......

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: ... And us! We're all here together! And we all made this the best festival ever!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Saaya: Fufu. Kasumi, Kasumi. You should probably put the audience last, right?

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: I know, I just... I really wanted to say thanks to all of you. Thank you, Saaya! Thank you, Rimi-rin!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Saaya: Sure.

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Rimi: Hehe...

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: Thank you, O-Tae!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: And thank you, Ari-

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Arisa: I get it, we all get it! Now get on with the show already!

chapter_19.title: chapter_19
chapter_19.action: Kasumi: Oh, yeah, of course! I'm sorry! This is a song that we all wrote together. We'd like to perform it for all of you today to show our great appreciation. So please listen... to Happy Happy Party!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: [Scene: Downtown - Festival Offstage]

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: Whew... We did it...

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: We really did it.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Rimi: I... I'm so tired...

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: That'll be the three encores we, for some reason, performed...

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: Hey come on, they enjoyed it! And it was super fun, right?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: It was.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: ... Okay, I'll admit that much. Yeah... It was fun.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Saaya: Kasumi~. Everyone. I know we all just want to relax right now. But we don't want the stalls to close on us, do we?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: ... Ah! The candy stall! Our star candy!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Saaya: That's right! We got so caught up in all the trouble, we completely forgot. We've got to hurry!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: She's right! Come on!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: Let's go.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: Mmm... Just a little... more...

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: Hey, hold on, you're all bent over that side. It's starting to look more scar than star.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: It's just so difficult~. Help me out here, Arisa~!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Rimi: Wow... Saaya-chan, yours is perfectly shaped!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Saaya: I mean, my family are all bakers. ... What are you making there, Tae?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: Kasumi.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: What...?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: And Arisa.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: That round-faced one is me?!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Saaya: Oh yeah, wow! They look just like us! Very cute, very cute.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: I'm pretty sure that's not a compliment.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: City Worker: ... Oh. You five.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: Ah... Was there something else, or...?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: City Worker: No, I was merely passing by. ... Oh. About next year's festival...

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: ...!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: (Just passing by, as if. Has he come to tell us there's no festival next year...?)

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: City Worker: If you intend to perform again, you'll need to apply for written permission in advance. I'll not have any more noise complaints.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: Huh?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: Does that mean...?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Rimi: We can... have another festival next year?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: City Worker: Seeing this many people here, I really have no choice. I'm on the people's side, you know. And I promise you the festival will continue for many years to come.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: City Worker: ... If I'm being honest, I underestimated you girls. Your enthusiasm, your spirit, your togetherness... It's as if you have some sort of-

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: Bond.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: City Worker: Hmm?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: Hehe, she's right. This was all thanks to a very special bond we share.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: City Worker: A very special bond... Just as we work to protect the people of this city, so do you five have your own calling. I feel I learned something today.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: Just come out and say you lost already. Is it so hard to accept your own feelings?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Saaya: Fufu. Really, Arisa? You're the one picking him up on that?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Rimi: B-but the festival! It's really coming back again next year...!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: And it sounds like the city will be paying for it, too.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: Hooray! Oh, I'm so happy~! Thank you so much, everyone~!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: Blegh, get off me, will you?! It's crowded enough here as it is.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Saaya: There are still a lot of people around, huh... How about we take our star candies somewhere a little more relaxed?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: Tada~! Poppin'Party star candies~!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: One for each of us.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Rimi: They're so cute~. I almost don't want to eat them~.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Saaya: Don't worry. We can always make them again next year, right?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: Yeah, you bet we'll be doing this again next year!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Saaya: But however many more festivals come along, I think we'll always remember this one in particular.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: I mean, just so much happened~. And this candy is like a delicious memory of it all!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: One more memory of the five of us together.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Rimi: I hope we'll make a lot more memories like this, too. I'm already excited for next year's festival♪

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: Just the festival~?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: The live shows, too!

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Tae: And the music. We'll write more songs together.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Saaya: I guess that means more retreats, then. Isn't that right, Arisa?

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Arisa: Blegh... Let's find somewhere else to stay next time.

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Rimi: How about a vacation? That might be fun...

chapter_20.title: chapter_20
chapter_20.action: Kasumi: I'm sure whatever we do, as long as we're all together it'll always be fun! Because the five of us? We're the very best of friends! Forever and ever~!!
